mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERV_ITEM_TB(no, userid, code, res_date, adult, teen, kids, quantity, sub_total) VALUES (seq_reserv_no.nextval, 'kim', #{code}, #{res_date},#{adult},#{teen},#{kids},#{quantity},#{sub_total})
mapper.select: select r.no, r.userid, m.name, r.code, r.res_date, r.adult,r.teen, r.kids, r.quantity, r.sub_total, e.title, e.gallery, r.pay from RESERV_ITEM_TB r, EXHIBITION_TB e, MEMBER_TB m where r.code = e.code and r.userid=m.userid and r.userid=#{userid} order by no desc
